source:
---
title: Dataset 82 - Tracelines
format:
  html:
    toc: true
    number-sections: true
engine: julia
execute:
  freeze: auto
  cache: true

#| echo: false
#| output: false
using UFFFiles

data.text/plain:
Universal Dataset Number: 82

  [1mName: Tracelines[22m

  [36m         Record 1: FORMAT(3I10)[39m
  [36m                   Field 1 -    trace line number[39m
  [36m                   Field 2 -    number of nodes defining trace line[39m
  [36m                                (maximum of 250)[39m
  [36m                   Field 3 -    color[39m
  
  [36m         Record 2: FORMAT(80A1)[39m
  [36m                   Field 1 -    Identification line[39m
  
  [36m         Record 3: FORMAT(8I10)[39m
  [36m                   Field 1 -    nodes defining trace line[39m
  [36m                           =    > 0 draw line to node[39m
  [36m                           =    0 move to node (a move to the first[39m
  [36m                                node is implied)[39m
  [36m         Notes: 1[41m)[49m MODAL-PLUS node numbers must not exceed 8000.[39m
  [36m                2) Identification line may not be blank.[39m
  [36m                3) Systan only uses the first 60 characters of the[39m
  [36m                   identification text.[39m
  [36m                4) MODAL-PLUS does not support trace lines longer than[39m
  [36m                   125 nodes.[39m
  [36m                5) Supertab only uses the first 40 characters of the[39m
  [36m                   identification line for a name.[39m
  [36m                6) Repeat Datasets for each Trace_Line[39m
data.text/markdown:
Universal Dataset Number: 82

**Name:   Tracelines**

```julia
         Record 1: FORMAT(3I10)
                   Field 1 -    trace line number
                   Field 2 -    number of nodes defining trace line
                                (maximum of 250)
                   Field 3 -    color

         Record 2: FORMAT(80A1)
                   Field 1 -    Identification line

         Record 3: FORMAT(8I10)
                   Field 1 -    nodes defining trace line
                           =    > 0 draw line to node
                           =    0 move to node (a move to the first
                                node is implied)
         Notes: 1) MODAL-PLUS node numbers must not exceed 8000.
                2) Identification line may not be blank.
                3) Systan only uses the first 60 characters of the
                   identification text.
                4) MODAL-PLUS does not support trace lines longer than
                   125 nodes.
                5) Supertab only uses the first 40 characters of the
                   identification line for a name.
                6) Repeat Datasets for each Trace_Line
```
data.text/html:
Universal Dataset Number: 82

Name: Tracelines

         Record 1: FORMAT(3I10)
                   Field 1 -    trace line number
                   Field 2 -    number of nodes defining trace line
                                (maximum of 250)
                   Field 3 -    color

         Record 2: FORMAT(80A1)
                   Field 1 -    Identification line

         Record 3: FORMAT(8I10)
                   Field 1 -    nodes defining trace line
                           =    > 0 draw line to node
                           =    0 move to node (a move to the first
                                node is implied)
         Notes: 1) MODAL-PLUS node numbers must not exceed 8000.
                2) Identification line may not be blank.
                3) Systan only uses the first 60 characters of the
                   identification text.
                4) MODAL-PLUS does not support trace lines longer than
                   125 nodes.
                5) Supertab only uses the first 40 characters of the
                   identification line for a name.
                6) Repeat Datasets for each Trace_Line
data.text/latex:
Universal Dataset Number: 82

\textbf{Name:   Tracelines}

\begin{verbatim}
         Record 1: FORMAT(3I10)
                   Field 1 -    trace line number
                   Field 2 -    number of nodes defining trace line
                                (maximum of 250)
                   Field 3 -    color

         Record 2: FORMAT(80A1)
                   Field 1 -    Identification line

         Record 3: FORMAT(8I10)
                   Field 1 -    nodes defining trace line
                           =    > 0 draw line to node
                           =    0 move to node (a move to the first
                                node is implied)
         Notes: 1) MODAL-PLUS node numbers must not exceed 8000.
                2) Identification line may not be blank.
                3) Systan only uses the first 60 characters of the
                   identification text.
                4) MODAL-PLUS does not support trace lines longer than
                   125 nodes.
                5) Supertab only uses the first 40 characters of the
                   identification line for a name.
                6) Repeat Datasets for each Trace_Line
\end{verbatim}

data.text/markdown:
```julia
Dataset82
```

A struct containing UFF Dataset 82 metadata.

**Fields**

  * `type::Symbol`: Data set type
  * `line_number::Int`: Trace line number
  * `num_nodes::Int`: Number of nodes defining trace line
  * `color::Int`: Color
  * `id_line::String`: Identification line
  * `line_nodes::Vector{Int}`: Nodes defining trace line
data.text/html:
Dataset82

A struct containing UFF Dataset 82 metadata.

Fields

  • type::Symbol: Data set type

  • line_number::Int: Trace line number

  • num_nodes::Int: Number of nodes defining trace line

  • color::Int: Color

  • id_line::String: Identification line

  • line_nodes::Vector{Int}: Nodes defining trace line
